subject: Tennis
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, who won men’s singles at the Beijing Olympics in 2008 but has battled knee tendinitis, said, “I do not find myself in a condition to compete.”
snippet: Rafael Nadal, who won men’s singles at the Beijing Olympics in 2008 but has battled knee tendinitis, said, “I do not find myself in a condition to compete.”
